browser.description: Browser to use for tests, one of 'all', 'chromium', 'firefox' or 'webkit'. If a playwright config is provided/discovered then the browserName value is expected from the configured 'projects'

config.description: Configuration file, or a test directory with optional

debug.description: Run tests with Playwright Inspector. Shortcut for 'PWDEBUG=1' environment variable and '--timeout=0',--max-failures=1 --headed --workers=1' options

lastFailed.description: Run only the tests that failed in the last run

grep.description: Only run tests matching this regular expression

globalTimeout.description: Maximum time this test suite can run in milliseconds

grepInvert.description: Only run tests that do not match this regular expression

workers.description: Number of concurrent workers or percentage of logical CPU cores, use 1 to run in a single worker

list.description: Collect all the tests and report them, but do not run

maxFailures.description: Stop after the first N failures

passWithNoTests.description: Makes test run succeed even if no tests were found

project.description: Only run tests from the specified list of projects

reporter.description: Common Reporter values to use, comma-separated, 'list', 'line', 'dot', 'json', 'junit', 'null', 'github', 'html', 'blob'. To configure reporter options, use the playwright configuration.

retries.description: Maximum retry count for flaky tests, zero for no retries

shard.description: Shard tests and execute only the selected shard, specify in the form 'current/all', 1-based, for example '3/5'

timeout.description: Specify test timeout threshold in milliseconds, zero for unlimited

updateSnapshots.description: Update snapshots with actual results. Snapshots will be created if missing.

ui.description: Run tests in interactive UI mode

uiHost.description: Host to serve UI on; specifying this option opens UI in a browser tab

uiPort.description: Port to serve UI on, 0 for any free port; specifying this option opens UI in a browser tab

skipInstall.description: Skip running playwright install before running playwright tests. This is to ensure that playwright browsers are installed before running tests.
